name: Sports: Say What? Multiple Choice Quiz | USA | 10 Questions

questions.text: What 'combines outdoor fun with knocking down trees with your face,' according to Dave Barry?
questions.explanation:
Snow Skiing.

	Dave Barry is a well known free-lance columnist and writer. He made the comment in an article referring to a trip to Aspen, Colorado he took with his wife.

questions.text: What nickname do boxing fans call 300-pound Eric Esch other than his nickname of 'King of the four-rounders'?
questions.explanation:
'Butter Bean'.

	'Butter Bean' started boxing in the American 'Tough Man Competitions'. He gradually went on to pro-boxing.

questions.text: What Dallas star was NFL's tallest player during the 1980's, at six-foot-nine?
questions.explanation:
Ed Jones.

	Ed 'Too Tall' Jones, was famous for his size and stature in the 80's. The other selections are not football players.

questions.text: What U.S. tennis star's father boxed for the Iranian Olympic team?
questions.explanation:
Andre Agassi's.

	Andre Agassi was raised in Las Vegas where he still calls home, he has a street named after him there.

questions.text: What NFL team did Mike Ditka (the Super Bowl winning coach for Chicago in the '80's and '90's) end his playing career with?
questions.explanation:
Dallas Cowboys.

	If you answered New Orleans you would be correct, if the question had asked where he ended his coachng career. Mike Ditka retired as a tailback while playing for Dallas.

questions.text: What was pitcher Dock Ellis the first major leaguer to wear in his hair while in a MLB game?
questions.explanation:
Curlers.

	Yep, Dock was the first to wear curlers in his hair on the field, while in a game. Dock had a flair for fashion, or maybe not!

questions.text: Who was the first sports announcer to address Muhammad Ali, by his Muslim name?
questions.explanation:
Howard Cosell & Cosell.

	Howard Cosell was a true class act.

questions.text: What did John Daly number the new iron he began teeing off with in 1996, because it had virtually no loft?
questions.explanation:
0.

	John Daly, though being considered a top golfer has missed many tourneys due to his battle with alcoholism.

questions.text: What's Billie Jean King's maiden name?
What former 'Saturday Night Live' star's antics irritated the golf commissioner at 1994's 'ATandT Pebble Beach National Pro-Am?
questions.explanation:
Bill Murray.

	The commish was a little annoyed because Bill was slowing down the rotations and game play.
